alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 8:24PM CDT until August 05 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Southern Webster County in south central Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Riverton, or 38 miles northeast of Phillipsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Inavale around 830 PM CDT. Red Cloud around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cowles and Guide Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
